bibdata.title: IEEE Guide to the Installation of Overhead Transmission Line Conductors
IEEE Guide to the Installation of Overhead Transmission Line Conductors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide provides general recommendations for the selection of methods, equipment and tools that have been found practical for the stringing of overhead transmission line conductors and overhead ground-wires. The guide also includes a comprehensive list of definitions for equipment and tools used in stringing and for stringing terms commonly employed. This guide is broad enough yet specific enough to be applicable to the stringing conductors of all sizes. The practices that are described provide for continuous control of the conductor from the initial setup to the ready for service condition.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
